mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plan de la ville de Louisbourg avec les ouvrages d'attaque des Anglais pour sa reddition, ainsi que ceux des assiegés pr. la deffense de la place, cette presente année 1758
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lartigue, Pierre-Jérome, 1729-1772
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Colored manuscript map of the 1758 siege of Louisbourg showing ships, troop positions, and batteries. Includes references to points of interest. Oriented with north to the upper right. Colored manuscript map of Cape Breton Island showing fortifications and batteries. Includes a table listing troop distribution, references to points of interest, and notes.
mdRecord.dcterms:place: Cape Breton Island, Nova Scotia, Canada
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Louisbourg (N.S.)--History--Siege, 1758--Maps--Early works to 1800
United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps--Early works to 1800
Cape Breton Island (N.S.)--Maps--Early works to 1800
